title: As a youth, what do you think is the importance of technology in our society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Importance of technology such as mobile phones and GPS are easy to see, as you are able to make sure you have a means of communication in the instance of a problem. But this is universal and if we are talking about only the importance of technology for the youth, it works in a respect that it allows for new friendships to be made through the use of social-media. In addition to this technology allows for more current and easy learning than ever before. It’s so easy for a younger person to just “google” something now and find the answer. But everything in moderation as this can have serious affects on younger people, especially when they are using social media and see the lives of others and then make a comparison on their life which can have negative effects.
